summary: this mod adds 2 new barrel\'s in riverwood for your forging needs...
descriptionHtml:
Hello nexus...

this is just a simple mod that will add 2 new barrel\'s in
riverwood the barrel\'s are ingredient\'s & Misc item\'s
and have 300 of each item in them with a 3-5 day respawn....

i made this mod cuz i forge alot of stuff in skyrim and hate having
to go mine the ores/ingots/soul gems/stuff.....i know there\'s the coc qasmoke room
but the barrel\'s in there only have x1 of each item so anyway......

just download and open the BuggsBombBarrels.rar to your skyrim folder

ps: dont know if it will work with NMM....sry.....
author: Buggsbomb
